cnbc.title: Tesla stock closes at record as investors rally around Musk's robotaxi hype despite slow EV sales
cnbc.summary: Wall Street's bullishness on Tesla has returned after the stock had its worst performance since 2022 in the first quarter of the year.

cnbc.title: Key ACA tax credits likely to expire after House speaker blocks vote
cnbc.summary: Democrats in the House back a last-ditch effort to extend Obamacare subsidies, which relies on a tactic recently used for the Jeffrey Epstein files bill.

cnbc.title: What Trump's reclassification of pot and CBD could mean for seniors, research and stocks
cnbc.summary: Reclassification to a Schedule III drug and possible Medicare coverage for pot could unlock new investment from pharmaceutical companies.

cnbc.title: Kushner's Affinity Partners exits Paramount bid for Warner Bros. Discovery
cnbc.summary: WBD agreed to sell its film studio and streaming service HBO Max to Netflix,  and plans to spin out Discovery Global, with its TV networks such as CNN and TNT.

cnbc.title: Payrolls rose by 64,000 in November after falling by 105,000 in October, delayed jobs numbers show
cnbc.summary: Nonfarm payrolls were expected to increase by 45,000 in November as the unemployment rate rose to 4.5%.

cnbc.title: U.S. crude oil closes at lowest level since early 2021 as looming surplus weighs on market
cnbc.summary: The oil market is under pressure as OPEC+ members have rapidly ramped up production and the U.S. pushes Ukraine to accept a peace agreement with Russia.

cnbc.title: Trump defends chief of staff Susie Wiles after she says he has 'alcoholic's personality'
cnbc.summary: Wiles, in the rare, candid interviews, described Trump's "reciprocal" tariff policy as "so much thinking out loud."

cnbc.title: Sheryl Sandberg says corporate climate 'one of the worst' she has ever seen
cnbc.summary: Sheryl Sandberg says corporate climate is 'one of the worst' ever and there is no excuse for companies to backslide on efforts to level career playing field.

cnbc.title: Birkin bag prices are sinking at auction despite high-profile sales
cnbc.summary: Luxury experts say aspirational luxury consumers are facing new pressures from inflation and a slowing job market, meaning fewer Birkin buyers at auction.

cnbc.title: Why China’s young are flocking to government jobs in record numbers
cnbc.summary: China's educated youth lower their ambitions to find security and better work-life balance in government jobs.
